description:
These thin and lightweight running socks have minimal cushioning for comfort in close-fitting shoes without sacrificing sensitivity. The higher cuff protects ankles from trail and road debris.

  • Durable nylon and olefin fabric manages moisture and breathability to keep your feet cool and comfortable
  • Firm support keeps feet going mile after mile
  • Midfoot arch band and y-heel keeps socks in place without bunching
  • Seamless toe for chafe-free comfort
  • Ultralight cushioning keeps feet comfortable without adding bulk
name: Swiftwick Aspire Four Running Socks - Unisex
